text: Ana nehu'na ha' vaheka'a zamatre'nuge'za e'za ama ran kumapinti zago fenona eme ha' hu'za eri'za vugahaze. Ana nehu'za tamagrama eri'zama erita eri fore'ma hu'naza zantamine, zago'amo marerisa zantamine, tamagri kini vahe'mo'zama ante'naza zantamine, goline silvanena maka eri'za Babiloni kumatega vugahaze.
